author: tocheng
body:
Update the AlCaReco matrix in the release (autoAlCa.py) to match the AlCaReco matrix twiki https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/AlCaRecoMatrix#25_ns_2e34_collisions_13_TeV
and Tier-0 configuration 
http://cmst1.web.cern.ch/CMST1/tier0/ProdOfflineConfiguration.py
title: AlCaReco matrix update
